channel.title: Client error (Infexis client)
channel.description:
[size=8pt]When I login my server, I get some error the screen turn's white and this CMD error come's up[/size]
[code] Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 84 at Class36.method531(Class36.java:111) at Model.method470(Model.java:796) at ObjectDef.method581(ObjectDef.java:248) at ObjectDef.method578(ObjectDef.java:118) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:41) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1502) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1021) at client.method146(client.java:11900) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:7907) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8772) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4429) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
A reward from in-game server will be rewarded if you can tell me a little tutorial on how to fix this
Skype:Jdm.ek1 msn (not prefered won't get request's for some reason..)Pkrune@live.com

item.title: Client error (Infexis client)
item.dc:creator: @Web_developer Web developer
item.description:
@Web_developer wrote:

[size=8pt]When I login my server, I get some error the screen turn’s white and this CMD error come’s up[/size]

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 84
        at Class36.method531(Class36.java:111)
        at Model.method470(Model.java:796)
        at ObjectDef.method581(ObjectDef.java:248)
        at ObjectDef.method578(ObjectDef.java:118)
        at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:41)
        at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10)
        at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1502)
        at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1021)
        at client.method146(client.java:11900)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:7907)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:8772)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
        at client.run(client.java:4429)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

A reward from in-game server will be rewarded if you can tell me a little tutorial on how to fix this

Skype:Jdm.ek1
msn (not prefered won’t get request’s for some reason…)Pkrune@live.com
